title: How often did gladiators die? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well. Gladiators can only die once. Were they all killed each time, and new ones take their place? No. These guys were investments to the owners. Watch the movie Gladiator. Best description you’ll ever have. They stayed alive as long as they could. Each new event, wagers and odds, increased. Imagine lasting ten events. There would be huge wagers on your death. Death smiles at us all, all we can really do Is smile back. Marcus Aurelius

Only once However gladiators didn't often die because they were expensive to train, clothe feed and keep. Injury and wounded yes. Most of the people killed in the arena were criminals or Christians. Enjoy spartacus and gladiator but they are films not reality.
